General.Name: Wafer Works
General.Description: Wafer Works Corporation engages in the research, design, development, manufacturing, trading, and distribution of semiconductor materials in Taiwan, China, the United States, and Internationally. The company offers polished silicon and epitaxial wafers, as well as single crystal ingots and doped silicon wafers used in semiconductor devices for power and digital applications. It is also involved in the research, design, development, manufacturing, trading, and processing of semiconductor wafers; and provision of technique transfer and consulting services. It supplies its products through sales representatives. Wafer Works Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.1, Pingguo Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 326014
